body:
Hello everyone!

I recently reached 400 subscribers on YouTube, and since the main source of viewers comes from you all, I really feel like I should do another giveaway!
I am not setting any subscriber goal, since this is just my way of saying "Thank you".

If you guys would like to see a giveaway, you can contact me on Skype (cosmoo3470) by telling me what you would like to be given away.

Also, I uploaded a prank call for my 400 subscriber special video, since I have not done one in a very long time.

In the past, I have been very immature and done quite inappropriate prank calls, but I am 100% avoiding those now.
This prank call is appropriate for everyone, and the people I talked to had a great laugh at the end of it all.
The background in the video is a game of Elimination.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2aJdTk83J4I

Once again, thank you all for being so supportive, and please give me giveaway ideas!
Thanks,
Porky.

title: 400 Subscribers! Prank Call + Giveaway?
